content.text: Accessibility Keyboard and Assistive Technologies Introduction
People with disabilities use technology in a variety of ways. Here are some examples:
content.html: People with disabilities use technology in a variety of ways. Here are some examples:

content.text: The term assistive technologies is a broad term for all these tools. As developers, we do not need to code for a particular technology. We use standards methods to make sure that our solution is accessible for all.
content.html: The term assistive technologies is a broad term for all these tools. As developers, we do not need to code for a particular technology. We use standards methods to make sure that our solution is accessible for all.

content.text: In this module, you will learn the basics of keyboard and screen reader navigation.
content.html: In this module, you will learn the basics of keyboard and screen reader navigation.
